snippet.title: Mario Andretti Racing Challenge gameplay (PC Game, 1991)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Mario Andretti Racing Challenge, Dos PC game produced by Distinctive Software in 1991 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/mario-andretti-racing-challenge/5819/
Mario Andretti Racing Challenge is a racing game, formula one. The gameplay flows as first-person perspective driving simulation with ability to replay your actions in third person camera view under different angles.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
Formula 1 Grand Prix - https://youtu.be/U4fC9CAjJPE
Moonshine Racers - https://youtu.be/FokvIc_HafE
Roller Blade Racer - https://youtu.be/Y-FwIzPDx-8
